title: Commission on Appointments rejected Gina Lopez as DENR Secretary
contentPreview:

content:
Of the 24-member body, eight voted to confirm Lopez’s ad interim appointment: 


Senators who voted YES:

Franklin Drilon

Bam Aquino

Kiko Pangilinan

Manny Pacquiao

Loren Legarda

Ralph Recto

Vicente Sotto

JV Ejercito


People who Voted NO:

Senators:

Alan peter Cayetano

Juan Miguel Zubiri

Gregorio Honasan

Panfilo Lacson


Representatives:

Julieta Cortuna

Sandy Ocampo 

Joel Almario 

Ronaldo Zamora

Rodolfo Albano III

Wes Gatchalian

Antonio Floirendo 

Roy Loyola 

Benhur Salimbangon 

Josephine Ramirez Sato

Abraham Tolentino 

Jerry Trenas
